about_the_game:
Small, strong and ready to do wrong – the M1934 is a compact semi-automatic pistol that will leave your enemies wondering where you had it hidden! Designed for Italian armed forces, this pistol is designed to last forever – which explains how it managed to outlast the zombie apocalypse!
This Weapon Bundle contains;
- The M1934 Pistol
- 2 Charms (Undercover Dagger, Iron Eagle)
- 2 Bespoke Weapon Skins (Strange Brigade, Nail Gun)
detailed_description:
Small, strong and ready to do wrong – the M1934 is a compact semi-automatic pistol that will leave your enemies wondering where you had it hidden! Designed for Italian armed forces, this pistol is designed to last forever – which explains how it managed to outlast the zombie apocalypse!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
